mdRecord.dcterms:description: Front facade partially obscured by trees

"Established in 1857, Llewellyn Park is listed in the National and State Historic Registers as both the first romantically landscaped and one of the first planned luxury estate communities in America." --http://www.llewellynpark.com/page/13266~93842/Highlights [work]
